name: Now you can't see me
description:
They can't see you if you don't see anything.
In this game, you will need to close your eyes and blink them to solve puzzles.
Armed enemies await around the corner. Pits, traps and hot-tempered ladies will make you think about solving riddles.

The game challenges you
Complete all 8 levels to unlock speedrun mode and compete with other players around the world.
Do you like hardcore? then try to complete the whole game without activating the prompts.

Game controls
The list of actions is limited to walking and blinking eyes, but this does not mean that there are as few possible actions in the game as there are buttons.


Plot
Not provided, for that there is a variety of funny voice acting for characters and videos.

-If there is no plot, then why go through the game at all?
-At the end you will be shown a cartoon. The final scene is definitely worth trying to beat the game.
